titlestmt.titleproper: Register of Joseph City : on the Little Colorado
Joseph City : on the Little Colorado
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Benjamin Sipes

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2010-10-04T16:38-0600

did.unittitle: Joseph City : on the Little Colorado

odd.p: Primary sources relating to the research on this book were donated to the repository. They are cataloged largely from MSS SC 769 to MSS SC 809. These items are also found in MSS 1028, 1520, and 1521. These materials can be retrieved by looking under George Shepard Tanner.

scopecontent.p: Photocopy of a typed draft of a book by George Shepard Tanner and Joseph Morris Richards. The work in a revised form was published in 1977 under the title: "Colonization on the Little Colorado: the Joseph City Region." The book is about Mormon settlement and colonization in the Little Colorado area of Northern Arizona.

userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the researcher to obtain any necessary copyright clearances. Permission to publish material from Joseph City : on the Little Colorado must be obtained from the Supervisor of Reference Services and/or the L. Tom Perry Special Collections Board of Curators.

appraisal.p: Utah and the American West and LDS cultural, social, and religious history (20th century Western and Mormon Manuscripts collection development policy, 5.VII, 2007).

prefercite.p: Initial citation: MSS SC 1094; Joseph City : on the Little Colorado; 20th Century Western and Mormon Manuscripts; L. Tom Perry Special Collections, Harold B. Lee Library, Brigham Young University. Following citations: MSS SC 1094, LTPSC.
